display_long_description:
Dance! Dance! Dance! brings the energy of a live club into VR. Follow your instructor Freya, hit the beat, and pop rhythm bubbles to learn real moves, level up your flow, and feel amazing.

Three ways to dance

Dance Off – Start here. Freya shows each move; you follow and pop bubbles at a relaxed pace.

Dance Off Pro – Turn up the tempo. Faster bubbles, tighter timing, higher scores.

Dance – Full routine in real time. No breaks—just pure flow with your instructor.

Depth that grows with you

Add directions (swipes), gestures (fist & point), and curving SLERP bubbles for bigger multipliers and serious challenge. Choose left- or right-hand play for accessibility, and climb the leaderboard at your own pace.

Built to feel great

A rebuilt, polished experience focused 100% on dancing—responsive tracking, clear feedback, and vibrant stages that make every session feel like a party.

Fresh music, every week

Launch with new tracks, then enjoy weekly song drops to keep you coming back for “just one more dance.”

Features

Three distinct dance modes for all skill levels

Instructor-led gameplay with instant, readable feedback

Difficulty layers: directions, gestures, and curved bubbles

Accessibility: left/right-hand options

Leaderboards, streaks, and score multipliers

Ongoing weekly track updates

Get in, feel the beat, and make the floor yours. Dance! Dance! Dance! — The rhythm is waiting.
